contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Camping|camping}} '''[[Camping]]''' is a recreational activity. '''Camping''' may also refer to: ==Activities== *[[Summer camp]]ing, an American children's activity *[[Backpacking (wilderness)]], hiking and camping overnight in backcountry ==Computing and Internet== *[[Camping (computing)]], holding a spot on a server that allows only a limited number of users *[[Camping (microframework)]], a microframework for writing web applications in Ruby ==Entertainment and media== ===Films=== * [[Camping (1917 film)|''Camping'' (1917 film)]], an American silent film with [[Victor Moore]] * [[Camping (1978 film)|''Camping'' (1978 film)]], a Dutch film by Thijs Chanowski * [[Camping (1990 film)|''Camping'' (1990 film)]], a Danish film with SÃ¸ren Pilmark, Per Pallesen and [[Rolv Wesenlund]] * [[Camping (2006 film)|''Camping'' (2006 film)]], a French film by [[Fabien Onteniente]] * [[Camping (2009 film)|''Camping'' (2009 film)]], a Danish film with [[Mia Lyhne]] and Kirsten Lehfeldt ===Games=== *[[Camping (game)]], a team ball game played in Mediaeval England, a forerunner of football *[[Camping (gaming)]], staying in one spot with a tactical advantage in a computer or video game ===Music=== *"Camping", a song included on the CD ''[[Disney Children's Favorite Songs 4]]'' ===Television=== *[[Camping (Parks and Recreation)|Camping (''Parks and Recreation'')]], a 2011 third season episode of the comedy series ''Parks and Recreation'' ==People== *[[Harold Camping]] (born 1921), Christian radio preacher ==Places== * Camping, used in most European countries as a loanword to mean [[campsite]] ==Telecommunications== *A feature on a [[private branch exchange]] telephone system ==See also== * [[Camp (disambiguation)]] * [[CAMP (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
